headline: How Investors Are Reacting To Synopsys (SNPS) AI Disruption Fears Amid Chiplet Push And Ansys Deal
summary: In recent days, Synopsys, Inc. has been presenting at the Chiplet Summit 2026 in Santa Clara, showcasing its chiplet and multi-die design expertise through multiple sessions led by senior technical leaders. At the same time, the company is facing market anxiety that artificial intelligence could reshape traditional electronic design automation workflows, even as its acquisition of Ansys and the integration of SimuTech Group highlight a broader push into advanced simulation and...
